Ratings.comment: I took 5 years of Spanish in high school and this is the easiest and most fun Spanish classes I've ever taken. Eric is so nice & a generous grader. There was only one test and 1 or 2 quizzes throughout the entire semester (and they were all easy because he told you exactly what to expect). Homework took 30 mins tops & there was often none at all.

Prof Garn is Grotsky and Fugly dont trust her Prof Garn is just as cute as Caesar, right? Prof Garn is just as smart as Caesar, people totally like Prof Barn just as much as they like Caesar, and when did it become okay for one person to be the boss of everybody because thats not what Rome is about! We should totally just STAB CAESAR!
Eric Garn was a great professor. He engaged the class and made learning fun. He never overloaded us with work and always let us know about deadlines far in advance.
